mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_pw, member_email, member_name) values(#{memberId},#{memberPw},#{memberEmail},#{memberName})
mapper.select: select * from member m inner join BOARD b on b.BOARD_WRITER = m.MEMBER_ID inner join BOARD_IMAGE bi on b.BOARD_NO = bi.BOARD_NO inner join ATTACH a on bi.ATTACH_NO = a.ATTACH_NO where member_id=#{memberId}
